docs: add all feature specifications \(001-005\)

Add 5 feature specifications for Smooth Flight game:
- 001-game-engine-core: 60fps game loop, Canvas rendering, input handling
- 002-aircraft-system: Aircraft spawning, movement, and path following
- 003-path-drawing: Player path drawing interaction system
- 004-collision-score: Collision detection and scoring system
- 005-airport-level: Airport levels, weather, and unlock system

Each spec includes:
- User stories with acceptance scenarios
- Functional requirements
- Success criteria
- Quality checklist

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
